description: Liu et al. (2022) note: "PKA and Epac1 regulated Nek7/NLRP3 signaling proteins. The schematic depicts the signaling pathway of PKA and Epac1 inhibition of Nek7 and NLRP3 signaling proteins to reduce retinal inflammation."  This pathway diagram was derived from https://pfocr.wikipathways.org/figures/PMC8762717__iovs-63-1-14-f009.html.
title: EPAC1 and PKA reduction of retinal inflammation
